# camera(framing:)

**Instance Method**

Creates a camera in the context of the map that frames the given map rectangle.

## Declaration

```swift
func camera(framing rect: MKMapRect) -> MapCamera
```

## Parameters

- **rect**: The map rectangle to frame.

## Return Value

Returns a [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MapCamera] that frames the rectangle you specified.

## Creating a camera proxy

- **camera(framing:)**: Creates a camera in the context of the map that frames the given coordinate region.
- **camera(framing:allowPitch:)**: Creates a camera in the context of the map that frames the given map item.
